oai_dc:dc.dc:title: MLSS Sentence Splitter Web Service
oai_dc:dc.dc:description:
The MLSS Sentence Splitter is a web service tool, which takes text as input and outputs the identified sentences surrounded by tags. The tool was tuned for Maltese. The download for this resource only contains the narrative description in a Word file.
The web service has one methods which can be invoked: - String tagSentences(String text)
The method takes a string as input, that being the text to be split into sentences, and returns another string of that text tagged.
The format of the output is as follows: <sentence> sentence_text </sentence>
